meanings: a child orphaned by the war
a child orphaned by the war

vlive.korean: 외롭다. John Lone은 고아에요. 자신의 생일을 모릅니다. It means lone. Actually, John Lone was an orphan, so he didn't know his birth date. 듣기 View video 10PM : 김태훈, 정시우의 무비톡톡! Movie talk!talk!
vlive.english: It means lone. Actually, John Lone was an orphan, so he didn't know his birth date.

vlive.korean: 사모님이 고아원에 데려다주라고 한 날 제가 아이 바꿔치기했습니다. When you told me to take the child to the orphanage, I secretly switched out the baby. 듣기 View video V WEB DRAMA : [첫 키스만 일곱 번째] 옥택연 엔딩
vlive.english: When you told me to take the child to the orphanage, I secretly switched out the baby.

examples.korean: an orphan child 발음듣기 고아. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
The meat needs to stew for two hours. 발음듣기 고기는 두 시간 동안 고아야 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The meat needs to stew for two hours. 발음

examples.korean: He was an orphan and lived with his uncle. 발음듣기 그는 고아라서 삼촌과 함께 살았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He was an orphan and lived with his uncle. 발음

examples.korean: She was orphaned in the war. 발음듣기 그녀는 전쟁 통에 고아가 되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She was orphaned in the war. 발음

examples.korean: The family decided to adopt one pitiful orphan. 발음듣기 그 가족은 가여운 고아 한 명을 입양하기로 결정했다. 절대어휘 5100
examples.english: The family decided to adopt one pitiful orphan. 발음
